sentences.en: B . Um - smarter that, I took the parkway south and got at Exit 14.
sentences.cn: 嗯. 然后, 我沿着园林路向南开到14号出口出来.
布里斯托Parkway最后到达格洛斯特的列车.

sentences.en: Did we accidentally keep numbering our parkway exits all the way to Mumbai?
sentences.cn: 要么是我们不小心,把高速公路出口的编号一直排到了孟买?

sentences.en: Drive on parkway, Park on the driveway.
sentences.cn: 开在马路上, 停在停车道上.

sentences.en: Drive on the parkway, Park on the driveway.
sentences.cn: 开在马路上, 停在停车道上.

sentences.en: He was possibly heading for the Southern Parkway in a white Ford.
sentences.cn: 他可能坐着一辆白色的福特车往南郡大道去了.

sentences.en: MIKE: We live outside of town, near the Merritt Parkway.
sentences.cn: 迈克: 我们住在城外, 在迈瑞特公园路附近.

sentences.en: MIKE: Well , the most popular part of town is out near the Parkway.
sentences.cn: 迈克: 城里最受欢迎的地方是公园路附近.

sentences.en: One parkway and three expressways meet here, andclose to 300, 000 vehicles a day are forced to reduce speed while navigating anetwork of tightly curved ramps.
sentences.cn: 一条景观道路（parkway）和三条快速路在此交汇，近30万辆机动车每天被迫在急转的弯道（tightly curved ramps）路网中减速慢行。

sentences.en: Passengers for Newport and Cardiff change at Bristol Parkway.
sentences.cn: 前往新港和加的夫的旅客请在布里斯托大道换车.

sentences.en: This is Betty from Parkway Health Clinic.
sentences.cn: 我是帕克街诊所的贝蒂.

sentences.en: This part of the highway is separated by a parkway.
sentences.cn: 这段高速公路中间有绿化带.

sentences.en: Uh - huh. Then, I followed Washington Avenue all the way to the parkway entrance.
sentences.cn: 嗯、嗯然后我顺着华盛顿大街一直开到园林路入口处.

sentences.en: Well , the most popular part of town is out near the Parkway, where I live.
sentences.cn: 城里最受欢迎的地方是公园附近, 我就住那儿.

sentences.en: You get off at Eastern Parkway.

trans.tran_cn: <美>（有草木的）大路，绿化道路，林阴大道
